content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257512,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスの事を知ると、素直に従う。","translatedEnglishLine":"When they learn about Caveblis, they obey obediently."},{"lineNumber":257513,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":257514,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラは一室を与えられ、そこに住む事になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Camilla was given a room and decided to live there."},{"lineNumber":257515,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの仲間にはならないが、ケイブリスはイヤだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"She won't become Rance's companion, but she hates Caveblis."},{"lineNumber":257516,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、ケイブリスはホーネットを破ったのか・・もうおしまいだな","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, Caveblis defeated Hornet... It's all over now."},{"lineNumber":257517,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ覚悟はつかないが奴が来たから私は自害しよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not ready yet, but since he's come, I will take my own life."},{"lineNumber":257518,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、そんなケイブリスがイヤだったらなんで私達と共にケイブリスと","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera, if you dislike Caveblis so much, why didn't you fight alongside us against him?"},{"lineNumber":257519,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦ってくれたらよかったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"It would have been better if you had fought with us."},{"lineNumber":257520,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットの奴もすかんとプライドの高いカミーラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet is detested, and Camilla is proud-minded."},{"lineNumber":257521,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラだったら、ケイブリスと互角に戦えたでしょ、","translatedEnglishLine":"If it had been Camilla, she could have fought Caveblis on equal terms."},{"lineNumber":257522,"originalJapaneseLine":"それなら自分がトップに立てばよかったのにとか適当な事を言うサテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera casually says, 'Then you should have taken the top position yourself.'"},{"lineNumber":257523,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、怯えているカミーラ","translatedEnglishLine":"But Camilla is frightened."},{"lineNumber":257524,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ケイブリスの事はサテラが思っているより、側にいたカミーラが怖さを知っている）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Regarding Caveblis, Camilla, who was close by, knows his fearfulness better than Satera thinks.)"},{"lineNumber":257525,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":257526,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、やっぱり殺させてくれないのね・・残念","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos, you won't let me kill him after all... How disappointing."},{"lineNumber":257527,"originalJapaneseLine":"当たり前だ、なんか手応えを感じだぞ、あれは落とせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, I feel some response; we can bring him down."},{"lineNumber":257528,"originalJapaneseLine":"もうすぐら俺に惚れさせる事が出来る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Soon, I'll be able to make him fall for me."},{"lineNumber":257529,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":257530,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンがユーティから連絡を聞いている","translatedEnglishLine":"Kopandon is hearing news from Yuti."},{"lineNumber":257531,"originalJapaneseLine":"完成している大型船２隻がある","translatedEnglishLine":"There are two completed large ships."},{"lineNumber":257532,"originalJapaneseLine":"北部の港に置いていたら魔軍が攻めて来た時に潰される可能性があるので","translatedEnglishLine":"Since they were placed in the northern port, there was a possibility they would be destroyed if the demon army attacked."},{"lineNumber":257533,"originalJapaneseLine":"南部の港に避難させていたのだが","translatedEnglishLine":"So they were evacuated to the southern port."},{"lineNumber":257534,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統司令部から連絡で兵力として使える物は全て使いたい。","translatedEnglishLine":"The chief command has communicated that they want to use everything available as military forces."},{"lineNumber":257535,"originalJapaneseLine":"大型船があるのなら兵器満載して大河沿いの海岸にいる魔軍の攻撃に使わせて欲しいと","translatedEnglishLine":"If there are large ships, they want to load them with weapons and use them to attack the demon army along the river coast."},{"lineNumber":257536,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか・・ある程度は効果はあるやろうけど、たぶん・・撃沈されてしまうやろな","translatedEnglishLine":"I see... it might be somewhat effective, but probably... they'll be sunk."},{"lineNumber":257537,"originalJapaneseLine":"せっかく作ったやけどな・・使う機会も無いし、しかたないか","translatedEnglishLine":"They were made with great effort... but there's no chance to use them, so it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":257538,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにランスが現れて話に割り込む","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Rance appears and interrupts the conversation."},{"lineNumber":257539,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっとまて、その大型船て俺様の冒険用だったんじゃないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a minute, weren't those large ships meant for my adventures?"},{"lineNumber":257540,"originalJapaneseLine":"そや、","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right,"},{"lineNumber":257541,"originalJapaneseLine":"今年夏頃に10年に一度の20海里が発生するので、ランスが海に冒険に出たいから","translatedEnglishLine":"Around this summer, there will be the 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon that occurs once every ten years, so Rance wants to go on an adventure at sea."},{"lineNumber":257542,"originalJapaneseLine":"誕生日プレゼントに寄越せと言っていた船や。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those ships he said should be given to him as a birthday present."},{"lineNumber":257543,"originalJapaneseLine":"ユーティ・・（へっ、あの無茶苦茶お金がかかっている大型船２隻って、ランスさんへの","translatedEnglishLine":"Yuti... (Heh, those two extremely expensive large ships were a present for Rance-san...) "},{"lineNumber":257544,"originalJapaneseLine":"プレゼントだったのですか・・）","translatedEnglishLine":"Were they really a gift...?)"},{"lineNumber":257545,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念やけど、ランスと一緒に未開の海を冒険したかったのやけど・・（デートがてら）","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a pity, I wanted to explore the uncharted seas with Rance... (as part of a date)"},{"lineNumber":257546,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな状況やしなしかないわ","translatedEnglishLine":"But given the situation, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":257547,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　※　自由都市１の[２４０／２／マリアの依頼]、[２４０／２２／ジフテリア]と","translatedEnglishLine":"※ Please note that 'Free City 1's [240/2/Maria's Request]' and '[240/22/Jifuteria]' have the same content,"},{"lineNumber":257548,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　内容が同じなので両方よく見て進めて下さい、ユーザーはどちらかだけ見る事になります","translatedEnglishLine":"so please review both carefully before progressing. Users will only see one or the other."},{"lineNumber":257549,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":257550,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞\t大型船を戦いに使うのを許可する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Permit use of the large ships in battle."},{"lineNumber":257551,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞\t大型船を戦いに使うのを許可しない","translatedEnglishLine":"> Do not permit use of the large ships in battle."},{"lineNumber":257552,"originalJapaneseLine":"まて・・それはお前が俺様にプレゼントしてくれるといったものだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait... those are the ones you said you would give to me as a present."},{"lineNumber":257553,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の物だ、無駄に沈められてはなんか不快だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"They're mine, and having them sunk wastefully is somewhat unpleasant."},{"lineNumber":257554,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなくやさしい言い方、コパンドンにもらった物を無下にしない、俺の宝だとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying it kindly, not to reject what Kopandon gave me, they're my treasure or something."},{"lineNumber":257555,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく、俺のだ、安全にキープしておけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, they're mine; keep them safe."},{"lineNumber":257556,"originalJapaneseLine":"うん、そやなとうれしそうなコパンドン","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, that's right, Kopandon seems happy."},{"lineNumber":257557,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、しかたないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":257558,"originalJapaneseLine":"それで少しでも戦況が楽になるならそうすべきだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"If that will make the battle situation easier even a little, then it should be done."},{"lineNumber":257559,"originalJapaneseLine":"ごめんな、この戦い終わったら・・また新しい船作るから・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, after this battle ends... I'll build a new ship again..."},{"lineNumber":257560,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、次の20海里発生はまた10年後か・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, the next 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon is in ten years again..."},{"lineNumber":257561,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、その時にいけばいいさ、楽しみは後にとっておこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, I'll go then; let's save the fun for later."},{"lineNumber":257562,"originalJapaneseLine":"うち・・（はっ・・40歳超えちゃうやん、さすがにもうやばいんじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Me... (Hah... I'll be over 40 then, isn't that a bit too late?)"},{"lineNumber":257563,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスも３５くらいか・・３５歳のランスか、かっこいいだろうな","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance will be about 35... 35-year-old Rance—I bet he'd be cool."},{"lineNumber":257564,"originalJapaneseLine":"不公平や、男は歳とってかっこいいのに・・　いや、まけんへんでがんばろう）","translatedEnglishLine":"It's unfair, men get cooler as they age... No, I won't lose, I'll keep trying."},{"lineNumber":257565,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス城、参謀本部によったランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, Rance stopped by the staff headquarters."},{"lineNumber":257566,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t戦略画面を見ながら・・うーん、兵士がたらん","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the strategic map... hmm, there aren't enough soldiers."},{"lineNumber":257567,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tウルザの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza's explanation."},{"lineNumber":257568,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各国、混乱状態の中、正規軍だけでにく予備役も動員して","translatedEnglishLine":"In all countries, amid chaos, not only the regular army but also the reserves have been mobilized."},{"lineNumber":257569,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t最大限の兵数で戦っています。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are fighting with the maximum number of troops."},{"lineNumber":257570,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tなお、この数は軍事作戦に参加している直接部隊の兵士の数である","translatedEnglishLine":"Note, this number counts soldiers in the direct units participating in military operations."},{"lineNumber":257571,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各地の守備兵や、後方を支える部隊などの数は入っていません","translatedEnglishLine":"It does not include the number of garrison troops or support units in the rear."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの事を知ると、素直に従う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When they learn about Caveblis, they obey obediently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラは一室を与えられ、そこに住む事になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla was given a room and decided to live there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの仲間にはならないが、ケイブリスはイヤだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She won't become Rance's companion, but she hates Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、ケイブリスはホーネットを破ったのか・・もうおしまいだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, Caveblis defeated Hornet... It's all over now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ覚悟はつかないが奴が来たから私は自害しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not ready yet, but since he's come, I will take my own life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、そんなケイブリスがイヤだったらなんで私達と共にケイブリスと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, if you dislike Caveblis so much, why didn't you fight alongside us against him?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦ってくれたらよかったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would have been better if you had fought with us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの奴もすかんとプライドの高いカミーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet is detested, and Camilla is proud-minded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラだったら、ケイブリスと互角に戦えたでしょ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it had been Camilla, she could have fought Caveblis on equal terms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなら自分がトップに立てばよかったのにとか適当な事を言うサテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera casually says, 'Then you should have taken the top position yourself.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、怯えているカミーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Camilla is frightened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ケイブリスの事はサテラが思っているより、側にいたカミーラが怖さを知っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Regarding Caveblis, Camilla, who was close by, knows his fearfulness better than Satera thinks.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、やっぱり殺させてくれないのね・・残念
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, you won't let me kill him after all... How disappointing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当たり前だ、なんか手応えを感じだぞ、あれは落とせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, I feel some response; we can bring him down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうすぐら俺に惚れさせる事が出来る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon, I'll be able to make him fall for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンがユーティから連絡を聞いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kopandon is hearing news from Yuti.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完成している大型船２隻がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two completed large ships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部の港に置いていたら魔軍が攻めて来た時に潰される可能性があるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since they were placed in the northern port, there was a possibility they would be destroyed if the demon army attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の港に避難させていたのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they were evacuated to the southern port.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部から連絡で兵力として使える物は全て使いたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The chief command has communicated that they want to use everything available as military forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大型船があるのなら兵器満載して大河沿いの海岸にいる魔軍の攻撃に使わせて欲しいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there are large ships, they want to load them with weapons and use them to attack the demon army along the river coast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか・・ある程度は効果はあるやろうけど、たぶん・・撃沈されてしまうやろな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... it might be somewhat effective, but probably... they'll be sunk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく作ったやけどな・・使う機会も無いし、しかたないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were made with great effort... but there's no chance to use them, so it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが現れて話に割り込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance appears and interrupts the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとまて、その大型船て俺様の冒険用だったんじゃないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, weren't those large ships meant for my adventures?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そや、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今年夏頃に10年に一度の20海里が発生するので、ランスが海に冒険に出たいから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around this summer, there will be the 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon that occurs once every ten years, so Rance wants to go on an adventure at sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誕生日プレゼントに寄越せと言っていた船や。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those ships he said should be given to him as a birthday present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーティ・・（へっ、あの無茶苦茶お金がかかっている大型船２隻って、ランスさんへの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yuti... (Heh, those two extremely expensive large ships were a present for Rance-san...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プレゼントだったのですか・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were they really a gift...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念やけど、ランスと一緒に未開の海を冒険したかったのやけど・・（デートがてら）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a pity, I wanted to explore the uncharted seas with Rance... (as part of a date)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな状況やしなしかないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But given the situation, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　自由都市１の[２４０／２／マリアの依頼]、[２４０／２２／ジフテリア]と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※ Please note that 'Free City 1's [240/2/Maria's Request]' and '[240/22/Jifuteria]' have the same content,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容が同じなので両方よく見て進めて下さい、ユーザーはどちらかだけ見る事になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so please review both carefully before progressing. Users will only see one or the other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞	大型船を戦いに使うのを許可する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Permit use of the large ships in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞	大型船を戦いに使うのを許可しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Do not permit use of the large ships in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まて・・それはお前が俺様にプレゼントしてくれるといったものだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait... those are the ones you said you would give to me as a present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の物だ、無駄に沈められてはなんか不快だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're mine, and having them sunk wastefully is somewhat unpleasant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなくやさしい言い方、コパンドンにもらった物を無下にしない、俺の宝だとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying it kindly, not to reject what Kopandon gave me, they're my treasure or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、俺のだ、安全にキープしておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, they're mine; keep them safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、そやなとうれしそうなコパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that's right, Kopandon seems happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、しかたないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで少しでも戦況が楽になるならそうすべきだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that will make the battle situation easier even a little, then it should be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごめんな、この戦い終わったら・・また新しい船作るから・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, after this battle ends... I'll build a new ship again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、次の20海里発生はまた10年後か・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the next 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon is in ten years again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、その時にいけばいいさ、楽しみは後にとっておこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, I'll go then; let's save the fun for later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うち・・（はっ・・40歳超えちゃうやん、さすがにもうやばいんじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Me... (Hah... I'll be over 40 then, isn't that a bit too late?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも３５くらいか・・３５歳のランスか、かっこいいだろうな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance will be about 35... 35-year-old Rance—I bet he'd be cool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不公平や、男は歳とってかっこいいのに・・　いや、まけんへんでがんばろう）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unfair, men get cooler as they age... No, I won't lose, I'll keep trying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、参謀本部によったランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Rance stopped by the staff headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦略画面を見ながら・・うーん、兵士がたらん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the strategic map... hmm, there aren't enough soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza's explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国、混乱状態の中、正規軍だけでにく予備役も動員して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In all countries, amid chaos, not only the regular army but also the reserves have been mobilized.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最大限の兵数で戦っています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are fighting with the maximum number of troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なお、この数は軍事作戦に参加している直接部隊の兵士の数である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note, this number counts soldiers in the direct units participating in military operations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の守備兵や、後方を支える部隊などの数は入っていません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It does not include the number of garrison troops or support units in the rear.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Users will only see one or the other."},{"lineNumber":257549,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":257550,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞\t大型船を戦いに使うのを許可する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Permit use of the large ships in battle."},{"lineNumber":257551,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞\t大型船を戦いに使うのを許可しない","translatedEnglishLine":"> Do not permit use of the large ships in battle."},{"lineNumber":257552,"originalJapaneseLine":"まて・・それはお前が俺様にプレゼントしてくれるといったものだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait... those are the ones you said you would give to me as a present."},{"lineNumber":257553,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の物だ、無駄に沈められてはなんか不快だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"They're mine, and having them sunk wastefully is somewhat unpleasant."},{"lineNumber":257554,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなくやさしい言い方、コパンドンにもらった物を無下にしない、俺の宝だとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying it kindly, not to reject what Kopandon gave me, they're my treasure or something."},{"lineNumber":257555,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく、俺のだ、安全にキープしておけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, they're mine; keep them safe."},{"lineNumber":257556,"originalJapaneseLine":"うん、そやなとうれしそうなコパンドン","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, that's right, Kopandon seems happy."},{"lineNumber":257557,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、しかたないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":257558,"originalJapaneseLine":"それで少しでも戦況が楽になるならそうすべきだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"If that will make the battle situation easier even a little, then it should be done."},{"lineNumber":257559,"originalJapaneseLine":"ごめんな、この戦い終わったら・・また新しい船作るから・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, after this battle ends... I'll build a new ship again..."},{"lineNumber":257560,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、次の20海里発生はまた10年後か・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, the next 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon is in ten years again..."},{"lineNumber":257561,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、その時にいけばいいさ、楽しみは後にとっておこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, I'll go then; let's save the fun for later."},{"lineNumber":257562,"originalJapaneseLine":"うち・・（はっ・・40歳超えちゃうやん、さすがにもうやばいんじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Me... (Hah... I'll be over 40 then, isn't that a bit too late?)"},{"lineNumber":257563,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスも３５くらいか・・３５歳のランスか、かっこいいだろうな","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance will be about 35... 35-year-old Rance—I bet he'd be cool."},{"lineNumber":257564,"originalJapaneseLine":"不公平や、男は歳とってかっこいいのに・・　いや、まけんへんでがんばろう）","translatedEnglishLine":"It's unfair, men get cooler as they age... No, I won't lose, I'll keep trying."},{"lineNumber":257565,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス城、参謀本部によったランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, Rance stopped by the staff headquarters."},{"lineNumber":257566,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t戦略画面を見ながら・・うーん、兵士がたらん","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at the strategic map... hmm, there aren't enough soldiers."},{"lineNumber":257567,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tウルザの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza's explanation."},{"lineNumber":257568,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各国、混乱状態の中、正規軍だけでにく予備役も動員して","translatedEnglishLine":"In all countries, amid chaos, not only the regular army but also the reserves have been mobilized."},{"lineNumber":257569,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t最大限の兵数で戦っています。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are fighting with the maximum number of troops."},{"lineNumber":257570,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tなお、この数は軍事作戦に参加している直接部隊の兵士の数である","translatedEnglishLine":"Note, this number counts soldiers in the direct units participating in military operations."},{"lineNumber":257571,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各地の守備兵や、後方を支える部隊などの数は入っていません","translatedEnglishLine":"It does not include the number of garrison troops or support units in the rear."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの事を知ると、素直に従う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When they learn about Caveblis, they obey obediently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラは一室を与えられ、そこに住む事になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla was given a room and decided to live there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの仲間にはならないが、ケイブリスはイヤだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She won't become Rance's companion, but she hates Caveblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、ケイブリスはホーネットを破ったのか・・もうおしまいだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, Caveblis defeated Hornet... It's all over now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ覚悟はつかないが奴が来たから私は自害しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not ready yet, but since he's come, I will take my own life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、そんなケイブリスがイヤだったらなんで私達と共にケイブリスと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, if you dislike Caveblis so much, why didn't you fight alongside us against him?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦ってくれたらよかったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would have been better if you had fought with us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの奴もすかんとプライドの高いカミーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet is detested, and Camilla is proud-minded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラだったら、ケイブリスと互角に戦えたでしょ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it had been Camilla, she could have fought Caveblis on equal terms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなら自分がトップに立てばよかったのにとか適当な事を言うサテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera casually says, 'Then you should have taken the top position yourself.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、怯えているカミーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Camilla is frightened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ケイブリスの事はサテラが思っているより、側にいたカミーラが怖さを知っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Regarding Caveblis, Camilla, who was close by, knows his fearfulness better than Satera thinks.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、やっぱり殺させてくれないのね・・残念
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, you won't let me kill him after all... How disappointing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当たり前だ、なんか手応えを感じだぞ、あれは落とせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, I feel some response; we can bring him down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうすぐら俺に惚れさせる事が出来る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon, I'll be able to make him fall for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンがユーティから連絡を聞いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kopandon is hearing news from Yuti.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完成している大型船２隻がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two completed large ships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部の港に置いていたら魔軍が攻めて来た時に潰される可能性があるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since they were placed in the northern port, there was a possibility they would be destroyed if the demon army attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の港に避難させていたのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they were evacuated to the southern port.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部から連絡で兵力として使える物は全て使いたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The chief command has communicated that they want to use everything available as military forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大型船があるのなら兵器満載して大河沿いの海岸にいる魔軍の攻撃に使わせて欲しいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there are large ships, they want to load them with weapons and use them to attack the demon army along the river coast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか・・ある程度は効果はあるやろうけど、たぶん・・撃沈されてしまうやろな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... it might be somewhat effective, but probably... they'll be sunk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく作ったやけどな・・使う機会も無いし、しかたないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were made with great effort... but there's no chance to use them, so it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが現れて話に割り込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance appears and interrupts the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとまて、その大型船て俺様の冒険用だったんじゃないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, weren't those large ships meant for my adventures?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そや、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今年夏頃に10年に一度の20海里が発生するので、ランスが海に冒険に出たいから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around this summer, there will be the 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon that occurs once every ten years, so Rance wants to go on an adventure at sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誕生日プレゼントに寄越せと言っていた船や。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those ships he said should be given to him as a birthday present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーティ・・（へっ、あの無茶苦茶お金がかかっている大型船２隻って、ランスさんへの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yuti... (Heh, those two extremely expensive large ships were a present for Rance-san...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プレゼントだったのですか・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were they really a gift...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念やけど、ランスと一緒に未開の海を冒険したかったのやけど・・（デートがてら）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a pity, I wanted to explore the uncharted seas with Rance... (as part of a date)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな状況やしなしかないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But given the situation, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　自由都市１の[２４０／２／マリアの依頼]、[２４０／２２／ジフテリア]と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※ Please note that 'Free City 1's [240/2/Maria's Request]' and '[240/22/Jifuteria]' have the same content,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容が同じなので両方よく見て進めて下さい、ユーザーはどちらかだけ見る事になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so please review both carefully before progressing. Users will only see one or the other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞	大型船を戦いに使うのを許可する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Permit use of the large ships in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞	大型船を戦いに使うのを許可しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Do not permit use of the large ships in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まて・・それはお前が俺様にプレゼントしてくれるといったものだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait... those are the ones you said you would give to me as a present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の物だ、無駄に沈められてはなんか不快だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're mine, and having them sunk wastefully is somewhat unpleasant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなくやさしい言い方、コパンドンにもらった物を無下にしない、俺の宝だとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying it kindly, not to reject what Kopandon gave me, they're my treasure or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、俺のだ、安全にキープしておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, they're mine; keep them safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、そやなとうれしそうなコパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that's right, Kopandon seems happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、しかたないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで少しでも戦況が楽になるならそうすべきだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that will make the battle situation easier even a little, then it should be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごめんな、この戦い終わったら・・また新しい船作るから・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, after this battle ends... I'll build a new ship again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、次の20海里発生はまた10年後か・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the next 20 Nautical Mile phenomenon is in ten years again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、その時にいけばいいさ、楽しみは後にとっておこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, I'll go then; let's save the fun for later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うち・・（はっ・・40歳超えちゃうやん、さすがにもうやばいんじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Me... (Hah... I'll be over 40 then, isn't that a bit too late?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも３５くらいか・・３５歳のランスか、かっこいいだろうな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance will be about 35... 35-year-old Rance—I bet he'd be cool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不公平や、男は歳とってかっこいいのに・・　いや、まけんへんでがんばろう）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unfair, men get cooler as they age... No, I won't lose, I'll keep trying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、参謀本部によったランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, Rance stopped by the staff headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦略画面を見ながら・・うーん、兵士がたらん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at the strategic map... hmm, there aren't enough soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza's explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国、混乱状態の中、正規軍だけでにく予備役も動員して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In all countries, amid chaos, not only the regular army but also the reserves have been mobilized.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最大限の兵数で戦っています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are fighting with the maximum number of troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なお、この数は軍事作戦に参加している直接部隊の兵士の数である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note, this number counts soldiers in the direct units participating in military operations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の守備兵や、後方を支える部隊などの数は入っていません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It does not include the number of garrison troops or support units in the rear.
